rule.name: Missing header
rule.definition: "Version 2 and later files use a global header." If version is 2 or more, there should be a global header in the container private data

rule.name: version
rule.definition: "version 0, 1 or 3" Maximum known version is 3, analysis stops (note: doc sometimes indicates version 4)

rule.name: version 2
rule.definition: "Version 2 was never enabled in the encoder thus version 2 files should not exist" Version 2 is forbidden, analysis stops

rule.name: micro_version 2
rule.definition: "For version 3, micro_version is 4, micro versions prior to this represent pre standard" Not supported version, high risk of decoding issue

rule.name: coder_type
rule.definition: "0 (Golomb Rice), 1 (Range coder), 2 (Range coder with custom state transition table)" coder_type >2 is not supported

rule.name: state_transition_delta
rule.definition: (To be defined)

rule.name: colorspace_type
rule.definition: "0 (YCbCr), 1 (JPEG2000_RCT)" colorspace_type >1 is not supported

rule.name: bits_per_raw_sample
rule.definition: "commonly 8, 9, 10 or 16"

rule.name: h_chroma_subsample
rule.definition: chroma subsampling factor can not be higher than slice width

rule.name: h_chroma_subsample
rule.definition: width divided by chroma subsampling factor is not an integer

rule.name: v_chroma_subsample
rule.definition: chroma subsampling factor can not be higher than slice height

rule.name: v_chroma_subsample
rule.definition: height divided by chroma subsampling factor is not an integer

rule.name: QuantizationTables
rule.definition: QuantizationTables incoherency

rule.name: initial_state_delta
rule.definition: initial_state_deltas incoherency

rule.name: ec
rule.definition: "0(32bit CRC on the global header), 1(32bit CRC per slice and the global header)" ec >1 is not supported

rule.name: intra
rule.definition: "intra 0(key and non key frames), 1(the video contains only key frames)" intra >1 is not supported

rule.name: crc_parity
rule.definition: "32bit that are choosen so that the global header as a whole or slice as a whole has a crc" CRC is wrong

rule.name: end of header
rule.definition: Real header end is met before or after expected header end

rule.name: slice x / y / width / height
rule.definition: Slices x/y and slices width/height are not coherant (areas are not sticked)

rule.name: quant_table_index
rule.definition: quant_table_index incoherency

rule.name: picture_structure
rule.definition: "0(unknown) 1(top field first) 2(bottom field first) 3(progressive)" picture_structure >3 is not supported

rule.name: sar_den
rule.definition: "0/0 when unknown " if num is not 0, den should be not 0

rule.name: slice_size
rule.definition: slice_size is bigger than frame size

rule.name: error_status
rule.definition: "0(no error), 1(slice contained a correctable error), 2(slice contains a uncorrectable error)" error_status >2 is not supported

rule.name: crc_parity
rule.definition: "32bit that are choosen so that the global header as a whole or slice as a whole has a crc" CRC is wrong

rule.name: end of slice
rule.definition: Real slice end is met before or after expected slice end

rule.name: end of frame
rule.definition: Real frame end is met before or after expected frame end
